title: Carrie Underwood celebrates 11-year anniversary of meeting husband Mike Fisher: 'He is my match'
text:
Carrie Underwood took time out to pay tribute to her husband, former professional hockey player Mike Fisher, on the anniversary of the day they met.

On Tuesday the country crooner took to Instagram and shared a picture of herself and Fisher out enjoying a romantic dinner.

'11 years ago yesterday [Monday, October 7], I met the love of my life,' she began in the caption before listing off his attributes that included the likes of 'patient, kind, the best dad, handsome, of course!'

Soul mates! Carrie Underwood paid tribute to her husband, former professional hockey player Mike Fisher, on the 11th anniversary of the day they met

In the caption, Underwood went to describe her husband as 'someone who accepts me and all my flaws...the same as me in many ways...opposite in some. But he is my match. The iron to sharpen me...'

"Tonight we celebrated at @delposto,' she added. A rare night out with amazing food and even more amazing company and conversation.

She concluded with a a nod to the future: 'Here’s to so many more years together. Love you, babe!'

Tribute: Underwood heaped on the compliments to her husband in the caption of her post

Love birds: Underwood has said that falling in love with Fisher was a dream come true; she is pictured performing at Madison Square Garden in NYC in October 2019

The couple recently celebrated their nine-year weeding anniversary in July.

In celebration of their big day, Fisher shared an Instagram post where he made reference to how fast their time together has gone.

'9 years feels like 9 minutes!!!! Grateful to be on this journey with you @carrieunderwood!! Time sure does fly #datenight #happyanniversary'

Another milestone! Fisher shared an Instagram photo of himself with his wife on their nine-year wedding anniversary in July

The couple first met at a backstage at a meet-and-greet after one of her concerts in 2008.

They would hit it off and get engaged in December 2009, which eventually led to them tying-the-knot in Greensboro, Georgia in July 2010.

They have since welcomed two sons to their family: Isaiah, four, and Jacob, eight months.
description: Carrie Underwood paid tribute to her husband, former professional hockey player Mike Fisher, on the 11-year anniversary of the day they met: 'He is my match.'
